channel.title: DI on Juneleung Chan
channel.description: Recent content in DI on Juneleung Chan

item.title: Film Skintone Saturation / Density
item.description: https://www.liftgammagain.com/forum/index.php?threads/film-skintone-saturation.18267/ Chris Wright Oct 4, 2023 #4 saturation is a perceived visual construct. this is why we have so many color models. HSL, HSV, HCL, etc. The tricky part is transforming from an additive color model to a subtractive one while at the same time, reversing our shot so that we perceive filmed subtractive properties in the first place. You can visually collapse the color model yourself with perceptual grading by reverse modeling.

item.title: Fotokem
item.description: Fotokem: https://fotokem.com/ LGG-Fotokem SHIFT ai Film Scan-Back service BETA is LIVE!: https://www.liftgammagain.com/forum/index.php?threads/fotokem-shift-ai-film-scan-back-service-beta-is-live.16386/ Colorist Meetup with Alastor Arnold Fotokem LA: https://open.spotify.com/show/7gvOmvy3HFcaKATAWPfRT8

item.title: Color Management in CG&DI
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> 目标: 不同软件内监看颜色一致 <!DOCTYPE html> Goal: To keep colors’ exactness across software * 本测试所有文件和工程: @juneleung: Color-Management-in-CG-DI * All files and projects can be downloaded from: @juneleung: Color-Management-in-CG-DI * 本测试使用 OCIO 和 ACES 1.2 进行色彩管理 * This test uses OCIO and ACES 1.2 for color management <!DOCTYPE html> 色卡 ColorChecker * 本测试使用的色卡为 ITU-R_BT.709_ColorChecker2014.exr , 其他色卡可以从 @colour-science: colour-nuke 下载 * The ColorChecker used in this test is ITU-R_BT.709_ColorChecker2014.exr , other ColorCheckers can be downloaded from @colour-science: colour-nuke <!

item.title: Film Emulation
item.description: 数据 Data Film Database: https://github.com/juneleung/FilmDatabase/ @Juneleung filmtypes: https://www.filmtypes.com/ 胶片模拟 Emulation SIGGRAPH 2010 - Color Enhancement and Rendering in Film and Game Production - Film Simulation for Video Games - Yoshiharu Gotanda https://renderwonk.com/publications/s2010-color-course/gotanda/slide_film_simulation_for_videogames.pdf https://renderwonk.com/publications/s2010-color-course/gotanda/course_note_film_simulation_for_videogames.pdf Realistic Film Grain Rendering https://www.lirmm.fr/~nfaraj/publications/film_grain_ipol/2017_Newson_film_grain.pdf AI FilterSimulation https://github.com/fg0521/filter4free @柴师傅在打工 论坛 Forum What is the best example of film emulation?: https://www.liftgammagain.com/forum/index.php?threads/what-is-the-best-example-of-film-emulation.15452/ CN：讨论｜最好的模拟胶片效果的数字电影是？: https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/4XlwYWN0hbasXtPZg8eGOw LUT Simulation: https://discuss.pixls.us/t/film-emulation-simulation/22935/8

item.title: Turnover between editing and DI color grading
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> 当你完成一个片子的剪辑之后，应该如何将你的工作完美的交接给DI呢？ <!DOCTYPE html> How to turn over your editing work to DI perfectly after you finish editing a film ? * 本文章所述不一定符合所有情况，请根据具体项目酌情进行修改。 * The descriptions in this article may not be applicable to all situations, please modify as appropriate according to specific projects. <!DOCTYPE html> 1、导出参考小样 Export Reference 一个剪辑完成片的视频，以供调色公司的画面套底参考。 A video of the edited film, as the DI’s conform reference. 具体文件参数 File Parameters: 苹果平台 mac 格式 (Format) : Quciktime MOV 编码 (Codec) : Apple Prores 类型 (Type) : 422HQ/422/proxy 声音 (Audio) : PCM/AAC 视窗平台 windows 格式 (Format) : MXF 编码 (Codec) : DNxHD / DNxHR 类型 (Type) : 1080p 100/85/80 8bit / DNxHR SQ/LB 声音 (Audio) : PCM/AAC 如e.
